verses.verse: Then <S%G1161><s%> drew near <S%G1448><s%> to him all <S%G3956><s%> the publicans <S%G5057><s%> and sinners <S%G268><s%> for to hear <S%G191><s%> him.

And the Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> and scribes <S%G1122><s%> murmured, <S%G1234><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> man receives <S%G4327><s%> sinners, <S%G268><s%> and eats <S%G4906><s%> with them.
And he spoke <S%G2036><s%> this <S%G5026><s%> parable <S%G3850><s%> to them, saying, <S%G3004><s%>

What <S%G5101><s%> man <S%G444><s%> of you, having <S%G2192><s%> an hundred <S%G1540><s%> sheep, <S%G4263><s%> if he lose <S%G622><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> of them, does not leave <S%G2641><s%> the ninety <S%G1768><s%> and nine <S%G1768><s%> in the wilderness, <S%G2048><s%> and go <S%G4198><s%> after <S%G1909><s%> that which is lost, <S%G622><s%> until <S%G2193><s%> he find <S%G2147><s%> it?
And when he has found <S%G2147><s%> it, he lays <S%G2007><s%> it on <S%G1909><s%> his shoulders, <S%G5606><s%> rejoicing. <S%G5463><s%>

And when he comes <S%G2064><s%> home, <S%G3624><s%> he calls <S%G4779><s%> together <S%G4779><s%> his friends <S%G5384><s%> and neighbors, <S%G1069><s%> saying <S%G3004><s%> to them, Rejoice <S%G4796><s%> with me; for I have found <S%G2147><s%> my sheep <S%G4263><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> was lost. <S%G622><s%>

I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, that likewise <S%G3779><s%> joy <S%G5479><s%> shall be in heaven <S%G3772><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> sinner <S%G268><s%> that repents, <S%G3340><s%> more than <S%G2228><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> ninety <S%G1768><s%> and nine <S%G1768><s%> just <S%G1342><s%> persons, which <S%G3748><s%> need <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5532><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> repentance. <S%G3341><s%>

Either <S%G2228><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> woman <S%G1135><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> ten <S%G1176><s%> pieces <S%G1406><s%> of silver, <S%G1406><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> she lose <S%G622><s%> one <S%G3391><s%> piece, <S%G1406><s%> does not light <S%G681><s%> a candle, <S%G3088><s%> and sweep <S%G4563><s%> the house, <S%G3614><s%> and seek <S%G2212><s%> diligently <S%G1960><s%> till <S%G2193><s%> she find <S%G2147><s%> it?

And when she has found <S%G2147><s%> it, she calls <S%G4779><s%> her friends <S%G5384><s%> and her neighbors <S%G1069><s%> together, <S%G4779><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> Rejoice <S%G4796><s%> with me; for I have found <S%G2147><s%> the piece <S%G1406><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> I had lost. <S%G622><s%>

Likewise, <S%G3779><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, there is joy <S%G5479><s%> in the presence <S%G1799><s%> of the angels <S%G32><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> sinner <S%G268><s%> that repents. <S%G3340><s%>
And he said, <S%G2036><s%> A certain <S%G5100><s%> man <S%G444><s%> had <S%G2192><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> sons: <S%G5207><s%>

And the younger <S%G3501><s%> of them said <S%G2036><s%> to his father, <S%G3962><s%> Father, <S%G3962><s%> give <S%G1325><s%> me the portion <S%G3313><s%> of goods <S%G3776><s%> that falls <S%G1911><s%> to me. And he divided <S%G1244><s%> to them his living. <S%G979><s%>

And not many <S%G4183><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> after <S%G3326><s%> the younger <S%G3501><s%> son <S%G5207><s%> gathered <S%G4863><s%> all <S%G537><s%> together, <S%G4863><s%> and took <S%G589><s%> his journey <S%G589><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> a far <S%G3117><s%> country, <S%G5561><s%> and there <S%G1563><s%> wasted <S%G1287><s%> his substance <S%G3776><s%> with riotous <S%G811><s%> living. <S%G2198><s%>

And when he had spent <S%G1159><s%> all, <S%G3956><s%> there arose <S%G1096><s%> a mighty <S%G2478><s%> famine <S%G3042><s%> in that land; <S%G5561><s%> and he began <S%G756><s%> to be in want. <S%G5302><s%>

And he went <S%G4198><s%> and joined <S%G2853><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%> to a citizen <S%G4177><s%> of that country; <S%G5561><s%> and he sent <S%G3992><s%> him into <S%G1519><s%> his fields <S%G68><s%> to feed <S%G1006><s%> swine. <S%G5519><s%>

And he would fain <S%G1937><s%> have filled <S%G1072><s%> his belly <S%G2836><s%> with the husks <S%G2769><s%> that the swine <S%G5519><s%> did eat: <S%G2068><s%> and no <S%G3762><s%> man <S%G3762><s%> gave <S%G1325><s%> to him.

And when he came <S%G2064><s%> to himself, <S%G1438><s%> he said, <S%G2036><s%> How <S%G4214><s%> many <S%G4214><s%> hired <S%G3407><s%> servants <S%G3407><s%> of my father's <S%G3962><s%> have bread <S%G740><s%> enough <S%G4052><s%> and to spare, <S%G4052><s%> and I perish <S%G622><s%> with hunger! <S%G3042><s%>

I will arise <S%G450><s%> and go <S%G4198><s%> to my father, <S%G3962><s%> and will say <S%G2046><s%> to him, Father, <S%G3962><s%> I have sinned <S%G264><s%> against <S%G1519><s%> heaven, <S%G3772><s%> and before <S%G1799><s%> you,

And am <S%G1510><s%> no <S%G3765><s%> more <S%G3765><s%> worthy <S%G514><s%> to be called <S%G2564><s%> your son: <S%G5207><s%> make <S%G4160><s%> me as one <S%G1520><s%> of your hired <S%G3407><s%> servants. <S%G3407><s%>

And he arose, <S%G450><s%> and came <S%G2064><s%> to his father. <S%G3962><s%> But when he was yet <S%G2089><s%> a great <S%G3112><s%> way <S%G3112><s%> off, <S%G568><s%> his father <S%G3962><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> him, and had compassion, <S%G4697><s%> and ran, <S%G5143><s%> and fell <S%G1968><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> his neck, <S%G5137><s%> and kissed <S%G2705><s%> him.

And the son <S%G5207><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to him, Father, <S%G3962><s%> I have sinned <S%G264><s%> against <S%G1519><s%> heaven, <S%G3772><s%> and in your sight, <S%G1799><s%> and am <S%G1510><s%> no <S%G3765><s%> more <S%G3765><s%> worthy <S%G514><s%> to be called <S%G2564><s%> your son. <S%G5207><s%>

But the father <S%G3962><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to his servants, <S%G1401><s%> Bring <S%G1627><s%> forth <S%G1627><s%> the best <S%G4413><s%> robe, <S%G4749><s%> and put <S%G1746><s%> it on <S%G1746><s%> him; and put <S%G1325><s%> a ring <S%G1146><s%> on <S%G1519><s%> his hand, <S%G5495><s%> and shoes <S%G5266><s%> on <S%G1519><s%> his feet: <S%G4228><s%>
And bring <S%G5342><s%> here <S%G5602><s%> the fatted <S%G4618><s%> calf, <S%G3448><s%> and kill <S%G2380><s%> it; and let us eat, <S%G5315><s%> and be merry: <S%G2165><s%>

For this <S%G3778><s%> my son <S%G5207><s%> was dead, <S%G3498><s%> and is alive <S%G326><s%> again; <S%G326><s%> he was lost, <S%G622><s%> and is found. <S%G2147><s%> And they began <S%G756><s%> to be merry. <S%G2165><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> his elder <S%G4245><s%> son <S%G5207><s%> was in the field: <S%G68><s%> and as he came <S%G2064><s%> and drew near <S%G1448><s%> to the house, <S%G3614><s%> he heard <S%G191><s%> music <S%G4858><s%> and dancing. <S%G5525><s%>
And he called <S%G4341><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> of the servants, <S%G3816><s%> and asked <S%G4441><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> these <S%G5023><s%> things meant. <S%G1498><s%>

And he said <S%G2036><s%> to him, Your brother <S%G80><s%> is come; <S%G2240><s%> and your father <S%G3962><s%> has killed <S%G2380><s%> the fatted <S%G4618><s%> calf, <S%G3448><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> he has received <S%G618><s%> him safe <S%G5198><s%> and sound. <S%G5198><s%>
And he was angry, <S%G3710><s%> and would <S%G2309><s%> not go <S%G1525><s%> in: therefore <S%G3767><s%> came <S%G1831><s%> his father <S%G3962><s%> out, and entreated <S%G3870><s%> him.

And he answering <S%G611><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to his father, <S%G3962><s%> See, <S%G2400><s%> these <S%G5118><s%> many <S%G5118><s%> years <S%G2094><s%> do I serve <S%G1398><s%> you, neither <S%G3763><s%> transgressed <S%G3928><s%> I at <S%G3763><s%> any <S%G3763><s%> time your commandment: <S%G1785><s%> and yet you never <S%G3763><s%> gave <S%G1325><s%> me a kid, <S%G2056><s%> that I might make <S%G2165><s%> merry <S%G2165><s%> with my friends: <S%G5384><s%>

But as soon <S%G3753><s%> as this <S%G3778><s%> your son <S%G5207><s%> was come, <S%G2064><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> has devoured <S%G2719><s%> your living <S%G979><s%> with harlots, <S%G4204><s%> you have killed <S%G2380><s%> for him the fatted <S%G4618><s%> calf. <S%G3448><s%>
And he said <S%G2036><s%> to him, Son, <S%G5043><s%> you are <S%G1488><s%> ever <S%G3842><s%> with me, and all <S%G3956><s%> that I have <S%G1699><s%> is yours. <S%G4674><s%>

It was meet <S%G1163><s%> that we should make <S%G2165><s%> merry, <S%G2165><s%> and be glad: <S%G5463><s%> for this <S%G3778><s%> your brother <S%G80><s%> was dead, <S%G3498><s%> and is alive <S%G326><s%> again; <S%G326><s%> and was lost, <S%G622><s%> and is found. <S%G2147><s%>
